items.title: Drive to Las Vegas
items.description: ~4.5 hour drive via I-15 N. Stop in Barstow if needed.

items.title: Check in at Horseshoe Las Vegas
items.location: 3645 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
items.description: Right on the Strip. Self-park or valet available.

items.title: Shark Reef Aquarium
items.location: Mandalay Bay, 3950 S Las Vegas Blvd
items.description: 2 x Adult timed-entry tickets. Enter within the hour of reserved time. Order #Y3P-NPY-HFLH.

items.title: Explore the Strip
items.description: Walk the Strip, check out the Bellagio fountains and the LINQ Promenade.

items.title: Dinner at Hell's Kitchen
items.location: Caesars Palace, 3570 S Las Vegas Blvd
items.description: Gordon Ramsay's signature restaurant. Reservations recommended.

items.title: Breakfast at The Egg & I
items.description: Popular breakfast spot. Try the skillets.

items.title: High Roller Observation Wheel
items.location: The LINQ Promenade, 3545 S Las Vegas Blvd
items.description: 30-minute ride with views of the entire valley.

items.title: Fremont Street Experience
items.description: The old-school Vegas strip. Great photo ops and cheap tables.

items.title: Pool & Relax at Horseshoe
items.description: Take it easy before the last night out.

items.title: Dinner at Mon Ami Gabi
items.location: Paris Las Vegas, 3655 S Las Vegas Blvd
items.description: French bistro with patio seating overlooking the Bellagio fountains. Early dinner before the show.

items.title: Cirque du Soleil
items.description: 2 tickets. Arrive early for good seats!

items.title: Drive Home
items.description: ~4.5 hours via I-15 S. Beat the Sunday traffic by leaving early.
